title: Ahmad - Name Meaning and Origin
text: About Ahmad The name Ahmad is of Arabic origin and is derived from the Arabic word "hamida," which means "to praise" or "to commend." It is a masculine name that carries the connotation of being highly praised or praiseworthy. In Islamic tradition, Ahmad is also one of the names of the Prophet Muhammad, emphasizing his praiseworthy qualities and his role as a source of guidance and inspiration. Most individuals with the name Ahmad are male. The popularity of the name has increased by 4.07% over the past year.
